sentences.sContent: As he reached over, Azrak slid a hypodermic syringe into his left arm.
sentences.sCn: 他把手臂伸过来时，阿兹拉克便将皮下注射器刺进他的左臂。

trans.tranCn: 注射器, 注油器, 洗涤器
trans.tranOther: an instrument for taking blood from someone’s body or putting liquid, drugs etc into it, consisting of a hollow plastic tube and a needle
